sys_variable_value.value:
You got the basic idea of the job now! Eventually, once we have enough money, you can try buying things from the Utility Services manufacturing line ("buy coal"). You'll need $10 to get your first one, but they generally accrue faster than things like paper!
Also, if you didn't notice, on the top right is a "..." button that you can click on that simplifies the buying process.
You got this!
